Symbol.Script_3D:
sj=1+2+4+8+16+32 if type_uch = "Прямой" then GROUP "stoyk" roty 90 rotz 90 otstup = 100/1000 PUT -b_st/2,t_plast,sj PUT -b_st/2,h_st - otstup,sj PUT -d_ogr/4,h_st,sj PUT d_ogr/4,h_st,sj PUT b_st/2,h_st - otstup,sj PUT b_st/2,t_plast,sj hotspot 0,0,0 hotspot 0,h_ogr,0 addz -t_st*0.5 PRISM_ NSP/3,t_st, get(NSP) del top ENDGROUP
GROUP "krep" roty 90 rotz 90 PUT -b_st/2,t_plast,sj PUT -b_st/2,0,sj PUT b_st/2,0,sj PUT b_st/2,t_plast,sj hotspot 0,0,0 addz -0.5*b_plast PRISM_ NSP/3,b_plast, get(NSP) del top if h_bolt > 0 then addz -h_bolt*0.7 addx 0.5 * b_plast - otstup_bolt CYLIND h_bolt, r_bolt del 1 addx -0.5 * b_plast + otstup_bolt CYLIND h_bolt, r_bolt del top endif ENDGROUP
stoyka = ADDGROUP("stoyk","krep") KILLGROUP "krep" KILLGROUP "stoyk" l_t = l_ogr + t_st GROUP "ogr_op_1" addz h_ogr - d_ogr / 2 roty 90-ang rotz 90 hotspot 0,0,0 hotspot l_t,0,0 addz -t_st/2 CYLIND l_t, d_ogr / 2 del top ENDGROUP GROUP "ogr_op_2" addz h_ogr - d_ogr / 2 roty 90-ang rotz 90 hotspot 0,0,0 hotspot l_t,0,0 addz -t_st/2 CYLIND l_t, (d_ogr / 2) - t_ogr del top ENDGROUP
ogr = SUBGROUP("ogr_op_1", "ogr_op_2") KILLGROUP "ogr_op_1" KILLGROUP "ogr_op_2"
GROUP "pop_op_1" addz h_ogr - h_pop roty 90-ang rotz 90 hotspot 0,0,0 hotspot l_t,0,0 addz -t_st/2 CYLIND l_t, d_pop / 2 del top ENDGROUP GROUP "pop_op_2" addz h_ogr - h_pop roty 90-ang rotz 90 hotspot 0,0,0 hotspot l_t,0,0 addz -t_st/2 CYLIND l_t, (d_pop / 2) - t_pop del top ENDGROUP pop = SUBGROUP("pop_op_1", "pop_op_2") KILLGROUP "pop_op_1" KILLGROUP "pop_op_2"
tube_ogr = ADDGROUP(pop, ogr) KILLGROUP pop KILLGROUP ogr
GROUP "plast" roty 90-ang rotz 90 PUT b_st/2 + t_bort,zazor_bort,sj PUT b_st/2 + t_bort,zazor_bort + h_bort,sj PUT b_st/2,zazor_bort + h_bort,sj PUT b_st/2,zazor_bort,sj PRISM_ NSP/3,l_ogr, get(NSP) del top ENDGROUP del top
for i = 1 to n_stoek if i = n_stoek then del top addx A addz l_ogr * sin(ang) PLACEGROUP stoyka del top else PLACEGROUP stoyka addx shag_stoek addz shag_stoek_z endif next i del top if ang = 0 then PLACEGROUP "plast" PLACEGROUP tube_ogr endif
if type_uch = "Угловой" then GROUP "ugl_op_1" addz h_ogr - d_ogr / 2 rotx 90 rotz a_iz ELBOW r_ug, a_ug, d_ogr / 2 del top ENDGROUP
GROUP "ugl_op_2" addz h_ogr - d_ogr / 2 rotx 90 rotz a_iz ELBOW r_ug, a_ug, d_ogr / 2 - t_ogr
del top ENDGROUP ugl_1 = SUBGROUP("ugl_op_1", "ugl_op_2") KILLGROUP "ugl_op_1" KILLGROUP "ugl_op_2"
GROUP "ugl_op_3" addz h_ogr - h_pop rotx 90 rotz a_iz ELBOW r_ug, a_ug, d_pop / 2 del top ENDGROUP GROUP "ugl_op_4" addz h_ogr - h_pop rotx 90 rotz a_iz ELBOW r_ug, a_ug, d_pop / 2 - t_pop
del top ENDGROUP ugl_2 = SUBGROUP("ugl_op_3", "ugl_op_4") KILLGROUP "ugl_op_3" KILLGROUP "ugl_op_4"
! GROUP "plast_ug" ! rotx 90 ! roty (180 - a_ug)/2 ! PUT b_st/2 + t_bort,zazor_bort,sj ! PUT b_st/2 + t_bort,zazor_bort + h_bort,sj ! PUT b_st/2,zazor_bort + h_bort,sj ! PUT b_st/2,zazor_bort,sj ! PRISM_ NSP/3,l_plast_ug, get(NSP) ! del top ! ENDGROUP ! PLACEGROUP "plast_ug" addx -r_ug ! addy -r_ug
PLACEGROUP ugl_2 PLACEGROUP ugl_1 endif
if type_uch = "Доборный" then l_t = l_ogr GROUP "ogr_op_11" addz h_ogr - d_ogr / 2 roty 90-ang rotz 90 hotspot 0,0,0 hotspot l_t,0,0 addz -t_st/2 CYLIND l_t, d_ogr / 2 del top ENDGROUP GROUP "ogr_op_22" addz h_ogr - d_ogr / 2 roty 90-ang rotz 90 hotspot 0,0,0 hotspot l_t,0,0 addz -t_st/2 CYLIND l_t, (d_ogr / 2) - t_ogr del top ENDGROUP
ogr = SUBGROUP("ogr_op_11", "ogr_op_22") KILLGROUP "ogr_op_11" KILLGROUP "ogr_op_22"
GROUP "pop_op_11" addz h_ogr - h_pop roty 90-ang rotz 90 hotspot 0,0,0 hotspot l_t,0,0 addz -t_st/2 CYLIND l_t, d_pop / 2 del top ENDGROUP GROUP "pop_op_22" addz h_ogr - h_pop roty 90-ang rotz 90 hotspot 0,0,0 hotspot l_t,0,0 addz -t_st/2 CYLIND l_t, (d_pop / 2) - t_pop del top ENDGROUP pop = SUBGROUP("pop_op_11", "pop_op_22") KILLGROUP "pop_op_11" KILLGROUP "pop_op_22"
tube_ogr = ADDGROUP(pop, ogr) KILLGROUP pop KILLGROUP ogr
GROUP "plast1" roty 90-ang rotz 90 PUT b_st/2 + t_bort,zazor_bort,sj PUT b_st/2 + t_bort,zazor_bort + h_bort,sj PUT b_st/2,zazor_bort + h_bort,sj PUT b_st/2,zazor_bort,sj PRISM_ NSP/3,l_ogr, get(NSP) del top ENDGROUP del top if ang = 0 and plank then PLACEGROUP "plast1" PLACEGROUP tube_ogr endif
Symbol.Script_2D:
if otobr_simv = 0 then PROJECT2 3,270,2 if type_uch = "Прямой" then HOTSPOT2 0, 0, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 0, 0, unID, l_ogr, 1+128: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 l_ogr, 0, unID, l_ogr, 2: unID=unID+1 for i = 1 to n_stoek if i = n_stoek then del top end_st = (n_stoek - 2) * shag_stoek + b_plast/2 line2 end_st, 0, A - b_plast/2, 0 add2 A,0 hotspot2 0,0 RECT2 -b_plast/2, -a_plast/2, b_plast/2, a_plast/2 del top else hotspot2 0,0 RECT2 -b_plast/2, -a_plast/2, b_plast/2, a_plast/2 if i < n_stoek - 1 then line2 b_plast/2,0,shag_stoek-b_plast/2,0 add2 shag_stoek,0 endif next i del top endif if type_uch = "Угловой" then HOTSPOT2 0, 0, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 0, 0, unID, r_ug, 1+128: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 -r_ug, 0, unID, r_ug, 2: unID=unID+1 rot2 180 ARC2 0, 0, r_ug, 0, a_ug hotspot2 0, r_ug endif
if type_uch = "Доборный" then HOTSPOT2 0, 0, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 0, 0, unID, l_ogr, 1+128: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 l_ogr, 0, unID, l_ogr, 2: unID=unID+1 line2 0, 0, l_ogr, 0 endif
Symbol.Script_1D:
po_st = 7850 k_okrugl = 10
!Верхняя труба ограждения 50x3 d_ogr = 50/1000 d_ogr_v = 42/1000 t_ogr = 3/1000 l_ogr_v = 60/1000 ves_ogr = ROUND_INT(3.48* k_okrugl) / k_okrugl ves_ogr_v = ROUND_INT(2.88 * l_ogr_v * k_okrugl) / k_okrugl
!Пластина крепления b_plast = 100/1000 a_plast = 70/1000 t_plast = 10/1000 h_bolt = 100/1000 r_bolt = 6/1000 otstup_bolt = r_bolt * 4 ves_krep = ROUND_INT((b_plast * a_plast * t_plast) * po_st * k_okrugl) / k_okrugl ves_bolt = ROUND_INT((PI * r_bolt * r_bolt * h_bolt) * po_st * k_okrugl) / k_okrugl
!Вторая труба ограждения 32x3 h_pop = 500/1000 + d_ogr d_pop = 32/1000 d_pop_v = 25/1000 t_pop = 3/1000 ves_pop = ROUND_INT(2.14 * k_okrugl) / k_okrugl ves_pop_v = ROUND_INT(1.63 * l_ogr_v * k_okrugl) / k_okrugl
!Стойка h_st = h_ogr - d_ogr * 0.9 t_st = 10/1000 b_st = a_plast ves_st = ROUND_INT(h_st * t_st * b_st * po_st * k_okrugl) / k_okrugl
!Пластина борта h_bort = 150/1000 zazor_bort = 20/1000 t_bort = 8/1000 l_plast_ug = 2 * r_ug * sin(a_ug / 2) if ang = 0 then ves_bort = ROUND_INT(h_bort * t_bort * po_st * k_okrugl) / k_okrugl if ang <> 0 then ves_bort = 0
ves_t1 = ves_ogr*l_ogr ves_t2 = ves_pop*l_ogr ves_s = ves_st*n_stoek ves_p = ves_krep*n_stoek ves_a = ves_bolt*n_stoek*2 ves_b = ves_bort*l_ogr ves_d = ves_ogr_v + ves_pop_v
ves_sec=ves_t1+ves_t2+ves_s+ves_p+ves_a+ves_b ves_dob=ves_t1+ves_t2+ves_b+ves_d ves_ug=ves_t1+ves_t2+ves_d
Symbol.Script_PR:
rz = ";" tip_el = "40" obozn_tr = "ГОСТ 10704-91" obozn_pl = "ГОСТ 19903-74"
call "Спецификатор" parameters tip_el="45", subpos = GLOB_ID, pos = GLOB_ID, obozn=" ", naen=naen, kol_vo_spec=1, komment=" "
if type_uch = "Прямой" then
id = "1" obozn = obozn_tr naen = "Труба D" + str("%.0mm",d_ogr) + "x" + str("%.0mm",t_ogr) ves = ves_ogr kol_vo_spec = l_ogr komment = "п.м." gosub "out"
id = "2" obozn = obozn_pl naen = "Пластина стойки " +str("%.0mm",h_st)+"x"+str("%.0mm",t_st)+"x"+str("%.0mm",b_st) ves = ves_st kol_vo_spec = n_stoek komment = " " gosub "out"
id = "3" obozn = obozn_tr naen = "Труба D" + str("%.0mm",d_pop) + "x" + str("%.0mm",t_pop) ves = ves_pop kol_vo_spec = l_ogr komment = "п.м." gosub "out"
if ang = 0 then id = "4" obozn = obozn_pl naen = "Пластина борта " +str("%.0mm",h_bort)+"x"+str("%.0mm",t_bort) ves = ves_bort kol_vo_spec = l_ogr komment = "п.м." gosub "out" endif
id = "5" obozn = obozn_pl naen = "Пластина крепления " +str("%.0mm",b_plast)+"x"+str("%.0mm",a_plast)+"x"+str("%.0mm",t_plast) ves = ves_krep kol_vo_spec = n_stoek komment = " " gosub "out"
id = "6" obozn = "ГОСТ 28778-90" naen = "Болты крепления М12х85" ves = ves_bolt kol_vo_spec = 2 * n_stoek komment = " " gosub "out"
endif
if type_uch = "Угловой" then
id = "7" obozn = obozn_tr naen = "Труба D" + str("%.0mm",d_ogr) + "x" + str("%.0mm",t_ogr) ves = ves_ogr kol_vo_spec = l_ogr komment = "п.м." gosub "out"
id = "8" obozn = obozn_tr naen = "Труба D" + str("%.0mm",d_pop) + "x" + str("%.0mm",t_pop) ves = ves_ogr kol_vo_spec = l_ogr komment = "п.м." gosub "out"
id = "9" obozn = obozn_tr naen = "Труба D" + str("%.0mm",d_ogr_v) + "x" + str("%.0mm",t_ogr) + " L=" + str("%.0mm",l_ogr_v) ves = ves_ogr_v kol_vo_spec = 1 komment = " " gosub "out"
id = "10" obozn = obozn_tr naen = "Труба D" + str("%.0mm",d_pop_v) + "x" + str("%.0mm",t_pop) + " L=" + str("%.0mm",l_ogr_v) ves = ves_ogr_v kol_vo_spec = 1 komment = " " gosub "out"
endif
if type_uch = "Доборный" then
id = "1" obozn = obozn_tr naen = "Труба D" + str("%.0mm",d_ogr) + "x" + str("%.0mm",t_ogr) ves = ves_ogr kol_vo_spec = l_ogr komment = "п.м." gosub "out"
id = "3" obozn = obozn_tr naen = "Труба D" + str("%.0mm",d_pop) + "x" + str("%.0mm",t_pop) ves = ves_pop kol_vo_spec = l_ogr komment = "п.м." gosub "out"
if ang = 0 then id = "4" obozn = obozn_pl naen = "Пластина борта " +str("%.0mm",h_bort)+"x"+str("%.0mm",t_bort) ves = ves_bort kol_vo_spec = l_ogr komment = "п.м." gosub "out" endif
id = "9" obozn = obozn_tr naen = "Труба D" + str("%.0mm",d_ogr_v) + "x" + str("%.0mm",t_ogr) + " L=" + str("%.0mm",l_ogr_v) ves = ves_ogr_v kol_vo_spec = 1 komment = " " gosub "out"
id = "10" obozn = obozn_tr naen = "Труба D" + str("%.0mm",d_pop_v) + "x" + str("%.0mm",t_pop) + " L=" + str("%.0mm",l_ogr_v) ves = ves_ogr_v kol_vo_spec = 1 komment = " " gosub "out"
endif
if uch_pokr then tip_el = "30" id = " " ves = 0 komment = "кг."
obozn = mat_pokr[2][1] naen = mat_pokr[2][2] n = split(mat_pokr[2][3], "%n" ,r_okr) kol_vo_spec = r_okr * spokr gosub "out"
obozn = mat_pokr[3][1] naen = mat_pokr[3][2] n = split(mat_pokr[3][3], "%n" ,r_gr) kol_vo_spec = r_gr * spokr gosub "out" endif
goto "eend" "out": call "Спецификатор" parameters tip_el=tip_el, subpos = GLOB_ID, pos = id, obozn=obozn, naen=naen, ves=ves, kol_vo_spec=kol_vo_spec, komment=komment ! str_out = "" ! str_out = tip_el + rz !Тип элемента ! str_out = str_out + id + rz !Позиция ! str_out = str_out + obozn + rz !Обозначение ! str_out = str_out + naen + rz !Наименование ! str_out = str_out + ves !Вес ! COMPONENT str_out, kol_vo_spec, komment return "eend":
Symbol.Script_VL:
values "type_uch" "Прямой", "Угловой", "Доборный" parameters ang = ATN(shag_stoek_z / shag_stoek) parameters B = l_ogr * sin(ang) parameters A = l_ogr * cos(ang) parameters n_stoek = INT(A / shag_stoek) + (FRA(A / shag_stoek)>0.1) + 1 if n_stoek < 2 then parameters n_stoek = 2 if (A - n_stoek * shag_stoek) > shag_stoek * 0.2 then parameters n_stoek = n_stoek + 1 if type_uch = "Прямой" then values "l_ogr" RANGE(0,200] STEP 0,krat_txt if ang = 0 then naen_ogr_o = "Ограждение Hc=" if ang <> 0 then naen_ogr_o = "Ограждение лестничное Hc=" parameters naen = naen_ogr_o + str("%.2m",h_ogr) + " Bc=" + str("%.2m",shag_stoek) + " L="+ str("%.2m", l_ogr) + "м.п." parameters ves = ROUND_INT(ves_sec * k_okrugl) / k_okrugl endif
if type_uch = "Угловой" then parameters l_ogr = (PI * r_ug * a_ug) / 180 parameters naen = "Угловой элемент Hc=" + str("%.2m",h_ogr) + " Rc=" + str("%.2m",r_ug) + " ac=" + str("%.2",a_ug) parameters ves = ROUND_INT(ves_ug * k_okrugl) / k_okrugl endif
if type_uch = "Доборный" then values "l_ogr" RANGE(0,200] STEP 0,krat_txt parameters naen = "Доборный элемент Hc=" + str("%.2m",h_ogr) + " L="+ str("%.2m", l_ogr) + "м.п." parameters ves = ROUND_INT(ves_dob * k_okrugl) / k_okrugl endif
CALL "Общий шаблон элемента" parameters all
